protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-11696
text: Seeds were sterilized by Ethanol:20% Bleach (commercial) =7:3 for 3 minutes with vigorous shaking then rinsed twice with Ethanol. After air drying, the seeds were plated on 0.5X MS 0.8% agar media. Following 3 days of stratification, plates were transferred to growth chamber and incubated under constant light for 4 days.
(Parameters: start time = 4, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, temperature unit = C, media = 0.5X MS agar media)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-11697
protocol.text: seedlings were grown blotting paper lied on 0.5xMS media for 3 days and transferred to either DMSO, GR24 or CTLVI containing media.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-11699
text: 3-day-old seedlings were ground into powder in liquid nitrogen, then total RNA was extracted by standard phenol/SDS method.
